1.0.name: wordpress/simple-gist-embed
1.0.description:
This plugin lets you embed Github's Gists in your posts or pages, but the main deference then all others is that this plugin also enables you to create Gists without leaving your WordPress. that's right you can create gists from within your WordPress admin.

Features

  • Updated to the latest GitHub API V3
  • Create Gists from your WordPress Admin panel
  • Internal cache built-in
  • Built in Tinymce (editor) button.
  • Works with all posts types (post,page,custom).

any feedback or suggestions are welcome.

check out my other plugins
